posts.post_title: T206 Neal Ball PSA6 for sale
posts.post_content:
$250.00 delivered. Piedmont 350 reverse. Check or money order only. Ed Hans; PO Box 307; Buffalo, NY 14207. New York residents must add sales tax. As Always "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations, etc. Please reply via email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] . Thank you for visiting my website.

Hey Ed- I'll take the Ball card. PM me back to confirm. Thanks.
